messages.message: I'm seeing this issue when trying to run Cypress locally against Crafting :thinking_face:
For this particular case I can just run it against crafting-cyp because I'm only making changes to the tests, not the product code, but we'll need to make sure we can do both at the same time
hmm maybe crafting-aihub isn't using @Paul H's new webpack script (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/third-party/crafting/snapshot/roles/workspace/files/daemons/webpack.yaml)?
`crafting-aihub` doesn’t use the crafting sandbox, unless you’re running it against your own sandbox (backed by `crafting-aihub`) @Jessica?
I’m assuming it’s the `jessica` sandbox? Do you mind if I ssh into it to debug?

Okay, it’s a two fold problem:
1. I forgot to update the base snapshot for regular (aka not cypress) sandboxes
2. regular sandboxes do not use the IS_CYPRESS flag anyway, so nothing will change. This makes sense since we wanted hot reloading on dev environments.
For now @Jessica, if this is bugging you, could you add this to your `getDevServer()` in `webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/webpack/utils.js`:
```    client: false,
    webSocketServer: false,```
I’ll update the snapshot in #1 and update this thread for #2
